instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> .. DC reading abnormal
threads.message:
sir , today i recieved a motherboard <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> , someone touch in bios . when i connected  with DC power supply ,dc reading was  0.030 - 0.450 - 0.515 - 0.614 - 0.593 -0.400 - 0.030 . and this is continue same reading .
Need Help

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> .. DC reading abnormal
threads.message:
As first step, flash a good BIOS file.
You can find few files on the forum.
